sentences.en: All other political parties there have been completely banned.
sentences.cn: 那里的其他所有政党都已经完全被取缔了。

sentences.en: Fewer than 7% of asylum seekers are accepted as political refugees.
sentences.cn: 寻求避难者中有不到7%的人被视作政治难民。

sentences.en: Five whole pages of script were devoted to rubbishing her political opponents.
sentences.cn: 整整5页讲稿都是对她的政敌的诋毁。

sentences.en: He is known for his political savvy and strong management skills.
sentences.cn: 他以睿智的政治头脑和强势的管理手腕出名。

sentences.en: He remains the anchor of the country's fragile political balance.
sentences.cn: 他仍然是维系该国脆弱的政治平衡的支柱。

sentences.en: He was a political prisoner (= one who was put in prison because he was thought to be harmful to the state) .
His political opinions have attracted the opprobrium of the Left.
sentences.cn: 他的政治观点遭到左派的抨击。

sentences.en: I believe I am capable of calculating the political consequences accurately.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我能准确预料此事的政治后果。

sentences.en: I get sick of being thought of as a political automaton.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌被看作政治机器。

sentences.en: It was time now to show more political realism.
sentences.cn: 现在是拿出更多政治务实精神的时候了。

sentences.en: Johnson's smashing victory in 1964 changed the political horizon substantially.
sentences.cn: 1964年约翰逊的大获成功给政界带来了翻天覆地的变化。

sentences.en: Some of them make no bones about their political views.
sentences.cn: 他们中的一些人坦率地表达了自己的政治观点。

sentences.en: The government is facing another political crisis.
sentences.cn: 该政府正面临着另一场政治危机。

sentences.en: The meeting had all the ingredients of high political drama.
sentences.cn: 这次会议具备了作为高度戏剧性的政治事件的一切要素。

sentences.en: The rabbis try to steer clear of political questions.
sentences.cn: 拉比们努力避开政治问题。

sentences.en: They feel strongly that their religion is incompatible with the political system.
sentences.cn: 他们强烈感受到他们的宗教信仰与政治体制不相称。

sentences.en: They keep on muddying the waters by raising other political issues.
sentences.cn: 他们不停地提出其他政治问题，力图把水搅浑。

sentences.en: Those people who took up weapons to defend themselves are political prisoners.
sentences.cn: 那些拿起武器自卫的人是些政治犯。

words.tran_cn: 精明的；有策略的；狡猾的；审慎的
（共产党中央委员会的）政治局；类似政治局的决策控制机构
政治，政治学；政治活动；政纲
进行政治活动；谈论政治

phrases.tran_cn: 政治权力；政治力；政治力量
政治改革，政制改革；变法
社会主义政治文明建设

trans.tran_cn: 政治的，政党的，对政治感兴趣的，争权夺利的
trans.tran_en: Political means relating to the way power is achieved and used in a country or society
